AlkSpeedUpdated(address,uint256,bool).notice: Emitted when a new ALK speed is calculated for a market

DistributedBorrowerAlk(address,address,u.notice: Emitted when ALK is distributed to a borrower

DistributedSupplierAlk(address,address,u.notice: Emitted when ALK is distributed to a supplier

MarketAdded(address,uint256,bool).notice: Emitted when a market is added

MarketRemoved(address,uint256,bool).notice: Emitted when a market is removed

OwnerUpdate(address,address).notice: Emitted when the owner of the contract is updated

TransferredAlk(address,uint256,address,b.notice: Emitted when ALK is transferred to a participant

acceptOwnership().notice: Accept the ownership of this contract by the new owner

addMarket(address,bool).notice: Add new market to the reward program

claimAlk(address).notice: Claim all the ALK accrued by holder in all markets

claimAlk(address,address,bool).notice: Claim all the ALK accrued by holder by refreshing the indexes on the specified market only

distributeBorrowerAlk(address,address,bo.notice: Calculate ALK accrued by a borrower and add it on top of alkAccrued[borrower]

distributeSupplierAlk(address,address,bo.notice: Calculate ALK accrued by a supplier and add it on top of alkAccrued[supplier]

getAlkAccrued(address).notice: Get the current accrued ALK for a participant

getAlkAddress().notice: Get the address of the ALK token

getAlkemiEarnAddress().notice: Get the address of the underlying AlkemiEarnVerified and AlkemiEarnPublic contract

getBorrowBalance(address,address,bool).notice: Get borrow balance of the specified market and borrower

getMarketTotalBorrows(address,bool).notice: Get market total borrows from the AlkemiEarnVerified contract

getMarketTotalSupply(address,bool).notice: Get market total supply from the AlkemiEarnVerified / AlkemiEarnPublic contract

getSupplyBalance(address,address,bool).notice: Get supply balance of the specified market and supplier

initializer(address,address,address,addr.notice: `RewardControl` is the contract to calculate and distribute reward tokensThis contract uses Openzeppelin Upgrades plugin to make use of the upgradeability functionality using proxiesHence this contract has an 'initializer' in place of a 'constructor'Make sure to add new global variables only in a derived contract of RewardControlStorage, inherited by this contractAlso make sure to do extensive testing while modifying any structs and enums during an upgrade

refreshAlkBorrowIndex(address,address,bo.notice: Refresh ALK borrow index for the specified market and borrower

refreshAlkSpeeds().notice: Recalculate and update ALK speeds for all markets

refreshAlkSupplyIndex(address,address,bo.notice: Refresh ALK supply index for the specified market and supplier

removeMarket(uint256,bool).notice: Remove a market from the reward program based on array index

transferOwnership(address).notice: Transfer the ownership of this contract to the new owner. The ownership will not be transferred until the new owner accept it.

updateAlkBorrowIndex(address,bool).notice: Accrue ALK to the market by updating the borrow index

updateAlkSupplyIndex(address,bool).notice: Accrue ALK to the market by updating the supply index
